title: Emerald Brilliance Diamond Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: Two Oval Cut Emeralds (5.38 carats and 7.23 carats)
14 South Sea Pearls (16.40 carats total weight). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a contemporary interpretation of classic South Indian jewelry. The intricate diamond patterns are interwoven in a floral and paisley motif, culminating in a central emerald and a larger pendant emerald, both set in prong settings to maximize their brilliance. Delicate South Sea pearls gracefully dangle from the diamond framework, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The back chain is a woven gold design, ensuring comfort and durability. The design blends traditional Telugu patterns with a modern openwork style.
colors: accentuated by the vibrant green of the emeralds and the lustrous white of the South Sea pearls. This classic combination is a hallmark of traditional South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal as a bridal piece or for grand festive occasions like Sankranti
description: This haaram is a unique fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The meticulously crafted diamond settings and the vibrant emeralds make it a truly captivating piece. The use of genuine South Sea pearls adds a touch of timeless elegance. The durable 18K gold ensures lasting value. A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. This is a piece that can be passed down through generations.
